headline: American Airlines Vs. Ford Motors: Which is the Better Value Stock After Q3 Earnings?
summary: With their "cheap" stock prices reflecting perceived discounts to other major airliners and automakers, let's see if American Airlines or Ford Motor stock is the better investment after Q3 results last week.

headline: Are US workers feeling doomed as more companies announce layoffs?
summary: As more companies like Target (TGT), automakers General Motors (GM) and Ford (F), and Meta Platforms (META) plan layoffs, how are American workers feeling about the current job market? Yahoo Finance senior reporters Ines Ferré and Allie Canal and Washington Crossing Advisors Senior Portfolio Manager Chad Morganlander weigh in on the state of the US worker, while taking downward trends in job openings and pivots toward automation. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Opening Bid.

headline: Yoga Pants, Oil and Pickup Trucks—These Companies Count on Canada
summary: For some of the U.S.'s biggest publicly traded companies, a deepening trade war with Canada poses a real financial risk.  Exxon Mobil and Ford Motor are among more than a dozen big publicly traded companies that generated at least 5% of sales from the U.S.'s northern neighbor in their most recent fiscal years.

headline: USA Rare Earth, Iren, Novartis, Softbank: Trending Stocks
summary: Rare earths companies CRML, MP, USA Rare Earth (USAR) and Lynas (LYC.AX, LYSDY, LYSCF, LYI.MU, LYIC.BE) fall on U.S.-China trade optimism. Softbank (9984.T, 3AG1.F, SFTBY, SFT.VI, SFTU.SG) approves the final chunk in one of the biggest ever AI investments: $22.5 billion in OpenAI. IREN, the crypto miner now providing computing power for AI, is up around 900% in six months. Novartis (NVS, NOVN.SW, NOT.F, NOT.MU, NOVNN.MX) plans to acquire a Californian biotech firm (RNA) for $12 billion. And Porsche (PAH3.DE, 1PORS.MI, POAHY) follows GM and Ford (F) in shifting its strategy away from EV's. For more live coverage of markets watch the full episode of Market Sunrise and head to Yahoo Finance.

headline: Dow Futures Jump on Softer Inflation and Rate Cut Hopes
summary: The Morning Bull - US Market Morning Update Monday, Oct, 27 2025 US stock futures are climbing before the open as investors respond to signs of softer inflation and a dip in Treasury yields, fueling hopes that interest rate cuts could be on the horizon. Market sentiment is also getting a boost from progress on US-China trade talks and a surge in services activity. This is prompting many to weigh whether the economic recovery can build momentum even as consumer confidence shows signs of...

headline: Heard on the Street Friday Recap: Keep on Truckin’
summary: Stocks rallied despite a trade-talk freeze. President Trump late Thursday said he was terminating trade talks with Canada. But the S&P 500 powered ahead on Friday, gaining 0.8%. The Dow Jones Industrial Average added 472 points.

raw.headline: Heard on the Street Friday Recap: Keep on Truckin’
raw.summary: Stocks rallied despite a trade-talk freeze. President Trump late Thursday said he was terminating trade talks with Canada. But the S&P 500 powered ahead on Friday, gaining 0.8%. The Dow Jones Industrial Average added 472 points.
